title: 6Pack(3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) Original [Apple MFi Certified] iPhone Charger Fast Charging Lightning Cable iPhone Charger Cord Compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/7 Plus iPad AirPods
descriptions:
Introducing the 6Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger, a must-have accessory for your Apple devices. This pack includes 6 cables of varying lengths (3, 3, 6, 6, 6, and 10 feet) to cater to all your charging needs.

**Apple MFi Certified:**
Our cables are Apple MFi Certified, ensuring 100% compatibility with a wide range of Apple devices, including various iPhone models from iPhone 6s to the latest iPhone 14 lineup, iPads like iPad Air 2 and iPad mini, and even AirPods.

**Quality Material and Construction:**
Made with quality copper wire, these cables are designed for durability and performance. The reinforced joint designs not only enhance the longevity of the cables but also ensure a consistent and reliable charging experience.

**Fast Charging and Data Transfer:**
Experience fast charging and data transfer with these cables. They support quick syncing and are compatible with fast charging, making sure your devices are always ready to go.

**Safety Features:**
Your safety is our priority. Our cables come with built-in safety features to protect your devices from overcharging and overheating.

**Warranty and Customer Support:**
We offer a 1-year worry-free refund and replacement guarantee. If you have any issues, our customer support team is ready to assist you within 24 hours.

Don't wait, get your 6Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger today and experience the convenience and reliability of our cables.
